graphstorm.gsf.get_feat_size

graphstorm.gsf.get_feat_size(g, node_feat_names)

Get the feature’s size on each node type in the input graph.

Parameters

gDistGraph

The distributed graph.

node_feat_namesstr or dict of str

The node feature names.

Returns

dict of int : the feature size for each node type.
